document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 95-21
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON REPEALING SECTIONS 12402, 12402.5, 12403, & 12406 OF THE EXISTING AREA, YARD & HEIGHT STANDARDS CONTAINED IN THE EXISTING COUNTY ORDINANCES ADOPTED BY THE CITY UPON INCORPORATION, AND ADOPTING A NEW ZONING ORDINANCE CHAPTER PERTAINING TO AREA, YARD & HEIGHT REGULATIONS
